title: Short-Intensive Professional Development Program for Elementary Mathematics Teachers Based on Lesson Study

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of mathematics pedagogy and experience in online class management
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration and project-based assessments using personal devices

learning_goals: Teachers can clearly define learning objectives and conduct curriculum analysis during the lesson design phase
Teachers can design and implement inquiry-based lessons that promote critical thinking by utilizing discovery learning-driven questioning strategies
Teachers strengthen collaborative competencies to derive lesson improvement plans by reflecting on peer assessment feedback
Learners can systematically document and present the lesson improvement process through project deliverables

resources: Zoom account and real-time collaboration tools

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
